name: Climbing Mount Crymore
description:
Climbing Mount Crymore

For Jess.

A rock climbing game for the Nintendo Gameboy!

In this game you will play as Jess, a rock climber determined to scale the most dangerous mountain in the world, Mount Crymore! Will you make it to the top??

Download the .gb ROM file below OR play right now in the web browser above!

(Playing on original hardware will give you the best experience!)

  Controls: 

Move(d-pad): WASD

A button(jump): L

B button (drop): K

Credits:

Created by:

Kevin Neilson

Art by:

megacrash

Sound Effects by:

Coffee 'Valley' Bat

Music, "Rock City 97" written by:

Kevin Neilson

Afterword:

This is 1 of 4 games I built for my friends this year for Christmas! 

Climbing Mount Crymore was built for my friend Jess. 

She loves to rock climb and she loves platformer games! Thanks Jess for giving me the inspiration to not only build, but finish a game this year!!!
